bibl.title: P. Duk. inv. 314: Agathis, Strategos and Hipparches of the Arsinoite Nome.
bibl.note: Petition sent by Theambesis, a wine-seller from Oxyrhyncha, to a strategos and hipparches. Arsinoite, xi 2, 199 BCE. - The papyrus. - The situation. - The loan. - Agathis strategos and hipparches. - The date. - Text, Translation, Notes.
SOSIN Joshua D. and John F. OATES, P. Duk. inv. 314: Agathis, Strategos and Hipparches of the Arsinoite Nome.
